sentences.en: He is an eccentric character who likes wearing a beret and dark glasses.
sentences.cn: 他是个怪人，喜欢戴贝雷帽和墨镜。

sentences.en: The traditional headgear of the French farmer, the beret, is now rarely made in France itself.
sentences.cn: 法国农民传统的帽子，贝雷帽，现在很少在法国本土制造。

sentences.en: The former Green Beret pleaded self-defense.
sentences.cn: 这位前“绿色贝雷“组织的成员为自己辩护为自卫。
